content: this short pattern shows you how to make a mini scarf in a knit-like look using tunisian crochet it expects that you know the basics of tunisian crochet and/or are willing to look up free online tutorials on how to make the different stitches it is written in a flexible format that allows you to customize the scarf to your liking used - 1 or 2 balls of yarn - tunisian crochet hook size 8 - regular crochet hook size 6 - scissors & needles
